rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB1000, ACC1000, ACC1200, ACF1200, ACG1000, ACP1000, ACP1200, ACW1000}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACB1000, ACC1000, ACC1200, ACF1200, ACG1000, ACP1000, ACP1200, ACW1000}

description: This unit introduces basic accounting concepts to non-accountants. The information requirements of two main groups of information users are examined. External users such as current and potential investors and internal users such as managers. This unit provides an introduction to the structure, meaning, analysis and interpretation of financial statements, in addition to exploring financial issues confronting managers, such as cost and performance measurement and budgeting.
